trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The crocodile can hold its breath for 1 hour.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The crocodile makes one Bite attack and one Tail attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 8}, reach 5 ft. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) Piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 15}). While {@condition Grappled|XPHB}, the target has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition and can't be targeted by the crocodile's Tail.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 8}, reach 10 ft. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.
